#include <bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
typedef long long ll;

vector< ll > v,s;

int main ()
{
    ll t; cin>>t;
    while(t--)
    {
        v.clear(); s.clear();
        ll f,h,w; cin>>f>>h>>w;
        v.resize(f); s.resize(f+ 1);
        for(int i = 0; i<f; i++) cin>>v[i];
        sort(v.begin(),v.end());
        //cout<<v[0];
        s[0] = v[0];
        for(int i = 1; i<f; i++) s[i]=(v[i]- v[i-1]);
        s[f] = w - v[f-1];
        sort(s.begin(),s.end());
        cout<<(ll) s[0] * h<<endl;
    }
    return 0;

}
